featured.text: Generally, they appear on both cheeks; a single dimple on one cheek is a relatively 31 phenomenon.
Some cultures are found to show preference for dimples on one’s cheeks, as the feature is claimed to be a sign of 32 .
Many babies, for example, have dimples on their 37 cheeks.

definition.zh_def: 臉頰，位於臉部的側面，通常指嘴巴和耳朵之間的部分。
definition.en_def: The fleshy part of the face located on either side of the mouth, between the nose and the ear.
definition.example: She smiled, revealing her dimples in her cheeks.
